title: They FINALLY Motorized the Main Camera!
description: Sometimes the interesting smartphones dont even come to the USA! Today we are durability testing the BRIGHT ORANGE Phantom X2 from Tecno. The Phantom X2 has a motorized main camera that theoretically helps provide hardware bokeh to portrait images. However... I have my doubts about it actually being functional.
